issue.title: [Rust] arrow crate lint and readability improvements
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8597](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8597). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Found a bunch of pedantic issues while reading through Rust arrow crate code, and than found a few more while running clippy.
